game.name: Vice Versa
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Play solo or with up to 5 players in this strategic card-stacking challenge. Place your entire deck on ascending and descending stacks, use clever resets, and survive two unique modes filled with tense, cooperative decision-making.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play solo or with up to 5 players in this strategic card-stacking challenge. Place your entire deck on ascending and descending stacks, use clever resets, and survive two unique modes filled with tense, cooperative decision-making.
